channel.title: Nintendo 3D's
channel.description:
I known about this since I saw the trailer for it.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=83GoGHBkdyg <-There
What do you guys think? I personally think it will be fun. Its suppose to be released in March 2011(Unless your in japan..)

item.title: Nintendo 3D's
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:10, topic:366310”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=462508.msg3383974#msg3383974 date=1288293646]

I cant wait to see what other companies have planned. Ofc nintendo gets blown out of the water everytime except for the fact they are cheaper.
[/quote]Actually, they have the highest console sales, beating out Sony and Microsoft every year. The features are often outclasses, but hey, they are the most family focused.

Reason they have more console sales is because its cheaper like I mentioned.[/quote]Yes, but they are also based towards everyone. Nintendo has many games that everyone will enjoy, 360 is generally geared towards more hardcore gamers (Kinect might change that, however), and Sony, well, kind of in the middle I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: Nintendo 3D's
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

If handholds have 3D technology in them, we better have some damn 3D TV’s and movies soon too. I know we have 2 3D TV’s here at my local Costco, so i will re-phrase that a tad. “We better have some AFFORDABLE 3D TV’s and movies soon”.
